alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Clay and eastern Dunklin Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Qulin, or near Chalk Bluff Natural Area, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Piggott, Campbell, Senath, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Holcomb, St. Francis, Pollard, Greenway, Glennonville, Saint Francis, Nimmons, Lorine, West Kennett, Leonard, Bell City, Pratt, Noland, Hargrave Corner and Carryville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
